query:
ALTER TABLE vehicles 
ADD COLUMN anttNumber VARCHAR(50) AFTER renavam,
ADD COLUMN anttExpiry DATE AFTER anttNumber,
ADD COLUMN derNumber VARCHAR(50) AFTER anttExpiry,
ADD COLUMN derExpiry DATE AFTER derNumber,
ADD COLUMN cadasturNumber VARCHAR(50) AFTER derExpiry,
ADD COLUMN cadasturExpiry DATE AFTER cadasturNumber;
